title: Extending PrairieLearn
text:
Comments about this assessment:

This assessment shows off uses of custom autograders on various PrairieLearn problems. Please see http://firas.moosvi.com/books/prairielearn_workshop/docs/home.html for more information!

zones.title: Basic and Official Autograders
zones.comment: This zone contains questions demonstrating the basic functionality of external autograder, as well as official autograders for Java and C. For more info, contact: Jonatan Schroeder jonatan@yorku.ca

zones.title: Haskell Autograder
zones.comment: This zone contains several questions demonstrating the Haskell autograder. For more info, contact: Steve Wolfman wolf@cs.ubc.ca.

zones.title: Sample R Question
zones.comment: This zone contains a question demonstrating the R autograder, and the mapping between 'evaluating code in unit tests' and 'evaluating student answers' that it uses. For more info, contact: Dirk Eddelbuettel deddel@illinois.edu.
